function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inefficient thermostat settings leading to increased energy consumption","Impact":"Higher energy costs and increased environmental impact","Mitigation":"Educating occupants on energy-efficient thermostat settings and implementing automated systems for energy management","Technologies":"Smart thermostats, occupancy sensors, and energy management systems","People":"Kuwaiti occupants","Owner":"Building managers, energy consultants"},{"Description":"Mismatched schedules of lights and occupancy leading to energy waste","Impact":"Increased energy consumption and higher electricity bills","Mitigation":"Implementing occupancy sensors to control lighting and educating occupants on energy-saving practices","Technologies":"Occupancy sensors, smart lighting systems, and energy management systems","People":"Kuwaiti occupants","Owner":"Building managers, energy consultants"},{"Description":"Cultural differences impacting energy consumption patterns","Impact":"Higher energy consumption due to incompatible default settings with traditional lifestyle","Mitigation":"Conducting surveys to understand cultural energy consumption patterns and implementing customized solutions","Technologies":"Survey tools, cultural analysis software, and customized energy management systems","People":"Kuwaiti occupants","Owner":"Energy consultants, cultural analysts"}]}
